long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a pop-up for every 60 minutes that users spend on social media websites. The pop up will show up to 5 seconds with a message that reminds users to take a break. Users can wait for the 5 seconds to pass or dismiss it immediately. This is helpful for users who want to take breaks from browsing social media.
